numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The percentage of players of color in the Women's National Basketball Association in 2019 is the same as the percentage of players of color in the National Basketball Association in 2020.
3. The other charts in 2020 show lower percentages of players of color.
5. The Major League Baseball chart has the lowest percentage of players of color in 2020 among the sports.
6. I wonder why the Major League Baseball chart has the lowest percentage of players of color in 2020.
8. The graph shows that people of color can play in sports teams.
9. The graph also shows that the number of head coaches of color is lower than the number of players of color.
10. The number of head coaches of color should increase.
11. The headline is: Diversity within major sports.
